string-array.name: Quotes
string-array.item: Rulers of the Vale of Arryn from the castle of the Eyrie.
Former vassals to House Tully, rulers of the Riverlands from the castle of Riverrun after ususrping their positions after the Red Wedding.
Rulers of the Iron Islands from the castle of Pyke. Divided, with memebers supporting either the Lannister or Stark/Targaryen cause
The current royal house of the 7 Kingdoms from the Red Keep of King\'s Landing......
Rulers of the North from the castle of Winterfell. Recently retook their lands from House Bolton....
Claimant royal house of the 7 Kingdoms, forver royal house and rulers of the Crownlands from the castle of the Red Keep. Currently based at ....
